column5: HA HA---so the wife and I stopped at a chip wagon on our journey today and seen this sign on their lot  Could'nt resist takin a foto  pretty sure we know what side he/she is on  Sidenote---great fish n Chips
LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL! Have to admit...if I were in charge of that sign, they'd have to "blur" some words out!
great sign, Gary does suck hard
Kaladar, right? Saw that today. The guy who owns that chip and burger shop is a character.  Man, there is some damn good fishing in that neck of the woods. Daaaaamn good.
One is Big Gull Lake.....and BTW I wouldn't miss the season...
